meaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical>'s <radical>hat</radical>, not to mention the <radical>hair</radical> stuck to said hat, is incredibly <kanji>rare</kanji>. If you have your hands on either of these things, you'll be a rich duck.
readingMnemonic: Then you look closer at the hat. It's about to get even <kanji>rare</kanji>r. Attached to the hair is the king's <reading>chin</reading> (ちん).
